display_long_description:
Hi everyone. this is 'Of Lies and Rain' demo!

This preview offers you the chance to explore the game’s opening level, should be about an hour of  gameplay. It’s the perfect way in our opinion to get a feel for the experience and decide if it’s worth your money before the full release.

Please keep in mind that we’re a small, dedicated team of just five people, and this is only our second game ever. Over the past two years, we’ve poured our hearts and souls into crafting this adventure, and we’re aiming for a 2025 launch.

We’re not locking in an exact release date yet, our goal is to polish every detail as much as we can. Once it’s ready, we’ll announce the official release.

Enjoy the demo, and thanks for joining us on this journey!"


# Of Lies and Rain

Of Lies and Rain is a story-driven first-person shooter built exclusively for VR. Set in a dark, sci-fi, post-apocalyptic world, you’ll fight to reclaim your past and save humanity from the brink of extinction.

# September 7, 2048

The world you once knew is gone, and so is your memory. An unfamiliar voice urges you to defeat A.D.E., the AI behind the long lasting 20-year war that has driven humanity into hiding beneath the Earth. The surface is now ruled by hostile machines, new lifeforms fighting for their survival.
